title: Linux autoheader Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the autoheader command in Linux, learn its purpose, and discover practical examples to generate configuration header files.

meta.title: Linux autoheader Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the autoheader command in Linux, learn its purpose, and discover practical examples to generate configuration header files.
meta.keywords: Linux, autoheader, configuration, header files, scripting, programming

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of autoheader Command

verify.name: Verify autoheader version
verify.hint: The output of 'autoheader --version' should show that the version of autoheader is 2.71.

steps.title: Install the Necessary Packages for autoheader

verify.name: Verify autoconf package installation
verify.hint: The 'autoconf' package should be installed on the system.

steps.title: Generate Configuration Header Files with autoheader

verify.name: Verify config.h.in file generation
verify.hint: The 'config.h.in' file should be generated in the '~/project/sample-project' directory after running the 'autoheader' command.
